articles.content: After Let’s Go Digital and Giuseppe Spinelli (Snoreyn) designed a gorgeous custom Marvel’s Spider-Man Miles Morales PS5 faceplate, the website has announced that it will be giving away five pairs of … [+880 chars]

articles.author: Chris Carter
articles.title: March 31, 2021 is now doomsday for a number of Mario games - Destructoid
articles.description: March 31, 2021 is now doomsday for a number of Mario games
articles.content:
Goodnight sweet plumber
So yesterday, we reported on the destruction of Super Mario Maker: which would be brought offline and removed from the eShop on March 31, 2021.
I thought about that date and… [+981 chars]
